data.name: Chernobylite - The Art of Chernobylite
data.detailed_description:
Join our Discord


About the Game

Chernobylite is a science-fiction survival horror RPG from developers The Farm 51. Set in the hyper-realistic, 3D-scanned wasteland of Chernobyl’s Exclusion Zone, explore a non-linear storyline in your search to uncover the truth of your tortured past.

Journey into Chernobyl’s Exclusion Zone with The Art of Chernobylite, a digital artbook from developers, The Farm 51 . In the artbook you’ll find concept artwork of characters, locations, weapons, and monsters, as well as 3D scans and real word photography from Chernobyl’s Exclusion Zone.
data.about_the_game:

Journey into Chernobyl’s Exclusion Zone with The Art of Chernobylite, a digital artbook from developers, The Farm 51 . In the artbook you’ll find concept artwork of characters, locations, weapons, and monsters, as well as 3D scans and real word photography from Chernobyl’s Exclusion Zone.
data.short_description: Journey into Chernobyl’s Exclusion Zone with The Art of Chernobylite, a digital artbook from developers, The Farm 51.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 7 SP1 (x64)
  • Processor: Intel Core i5-2500K CPU
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Geforce GTX 660/GTX 1050/GTX 770M or AMD Radeon R7 260/Integrated Ryzen 7 4800H
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 40 GB available space
  • Additional Notes: 30 FPS @ LOW Video Settings
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows 7 SP1 (x64), Windows 8 (x64), Windows 10 (x64)
  • Processor: Intel Core i7 4790k CPU
  • Memory: 16 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Geforce GTX 970/GTX 1060 or AMD Radeon RX 480/RX 570
  • Storage: 40 GB available space
  • Additional Notes: 30 FPS @ Ultra Video Settings / 60 FPS @ HIGH Video Settings

data.legal_notice: Chernobylite © 2021.  Published by AIG and The Farm 51. Developed by The Farm 51.  All product names, trademarks and registered trademarks are property of their respective owners.
